Rule.Name: zlib
Rule.Description: General setting for building of ZLib library

StringProperty.Name: ZLibDir
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a relative path to the root directory; can include environment variables.

StringProperty.Name: OutDir
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a relative path to the output file directory; can include environment variables.

StringProperty.Name: IntDir
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a relative path to the intermediate file directory; can include environment variables.

StringProperty.Name: TargetName
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a file name that this project will generate.

StringProperty.Name: TargetExt
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a file extension that this project will generate. (Example: .exe or .dll)

StringListProperty.Name: ExtensionsToDeleteOnClean
StringListProperty.Description: Semi-colon delimited wildcard specification for which files in the intermediate directory to delete on clean or rebuild.

StringProperty.Name: BuildLogFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the build log file to write to when build logging is enabled.

DynamicEnumProperty.Name: PlatformToolset
DynamicEnumProperty.Description: Specifies the toolset used for building the current configuration; If not set, the default toolset is used

EnumProperty.Name: ConfigurationType
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the type of output this configuration generates.

EnumProperty.Name: CharacterSet
EnumProperty.Description: Tells the compiler to use the specified character set; aids in localization issues.

EnumProperty.Name: CLRSupport
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies whether this configuration supports the Common Language Runtime. This is incompatible with some other settings, e.g. runtime checks. See help for /clr family of C++ compiler switches for full list of conflicts.

EnumValue.Name: Pure
EnumValue.DisplayName: Pure MSIL Common Language Runtime Support (/clr:pure)
EnumValue.Description: Pure MSIL Common Language Runtime Support (/clr:pure)

EnumValue.Name: Safe
EnumValue.DisplayName: Safe MSIL Common Language Runtime Support (/clr:safe)
EnumValue.Description: Safe MSIL Common Language Runtime Support (/clr:safe)

EnumValue.Name: OldSyntax
EnumValue.DisplayName: Common Language Runtime Support, Old Syntax (/clr:oldSyntax)
EnumValue.Description: Common Language Runtime Support, Old Syntax (/clr:oldSyntax)

EnumProperty.Name: WholeProgramOptimization
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies that the program will be optimized across .obj boundaries; works best if C/C++ optimizations are turned on.

BoolProperty.Name: WindowsAppContainer
BoolProperty.Description: Enable this project to support Windows Store apps.

BoolProperty.Name: UseAssembler
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether this configuration should use ASM implementations

BoolProperty.Name: UseWINAPI
BoolProperty.Description: It uses the WINAPI calling convention for the exported functions.
